title: Red Sox recall, will start top prospect Anthony
description: The Red Sox have called up outfielder Roman Anthony, the No. 1 prospect in baseball, hopeful he can provide a jolt to a team that has disappointed over the season's first 67 games.
author: Jeff Passan

title: FAMU AD accused of stealing $24K from old job
description: Florida A&M athletic director Angela Suggs was arrested Monday on fraud and theft charges for allegedly using a corporate credit card for personal use totaling more than $24,000 at her former job.

title: 'Bellamy's daring Wales unafraid to lose in pursuit of glory'
description: Craig Bellamy says he is "beyond proud" after a dramatic 4-3 loss to Belgium - his first defeat as Wales head coach.

title: 'Opposite of Postecoglou' - what could Spurs expect from 'chef' Frank?
description: Would Thomas Frank, who has likened managing in the Premier League to being head chef in a high-end restaurant, serve up success at Tottenham?

title: Stephen A. Smith ranks Rockets as No. 2 trade spot for Giannis Antetokounmpo, Kevin Durant
description: For the two superstars, longtime ESPN host and NBA media personality Stephen A. Smith ranks Houston high on his list of potential trade destinations.

title: Holmgren-Hartenstein help Thunder in 2025 NBA Finals Game 2 win over Pacers
description: Holmgren-Hartenstein help Oklahoma City Thunder in 2025 NBA Finals Game 2 win over Indiana Pacers.

title: Man Utd make approach for Sporting's Gyokeres
description: Manchester United have made an initial approach for Sporting striker Viktor Gyokeres through intermediaries, Sky Sports News has been told.

title: Tuchel 'convinced' England can compete with world's best
description: Thomas Tuchel remains convinced England can compete with the world’s best, despite once again criticising the approach of his players against Andorra.
